fields.Title: Prompt Engineering for Philosophy Students
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span style="font-weight:400;">“Prompt engineering” is often touted as a way to positively incorporate AI in student learning. But just how assignments might implement prompt engineering to advance critical inquiry is underdeveloped. I will share two activities that actively engage students with GAI in a constructive and critical back-and-forth within the context of philosophy courses I teach at Boise State University. <br><br>A version of this project is being presented at Innovate Idaho: Teaching and Learning with AI Symposium, April 3, 2025, 11:15 am-12:15 pm. https://event.fourwaves.com/innovateid25/pages<br></span></p>
